short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Harbor is a browser extension that helps you organize tabs, navigate seamlessly, and pick up right where you left off.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
一款开箱即用的 Chrome 标签页管理工具，提供比 OneTab 更优质的用户体验

## 看板式标签页管理 UI 
- 🎯 在 Trello 式的看板中以拖拽的方式来管理标签页集合
- 🔄 一键将标签页集合恢复至浏览器窗口
- 💾 本地优先：您的标签页数据优先保存在本地设备上。可随时导入导出
- 🔒 自动备份至本地文件，确保您的标签页随时可访问，永不丢失

## 在 Popup 窗口实现即时标签页整理
- 🤖 AI 驱动的智能标签页分组
- 🌐 按域名自动分组标签页
- 🗑️ 一键为当前窗口的标签页去重
- 💾 Save All Tabs：快速保存标签页至 Harbor，保留「标签分组」结构

## 第三方应用同步：从「暂存」的标签页集合到「永久」的收藏夹
- 🔗支持与 Notion 和 Raindrop 同步标签页，让您可以将重要的标签页集合永久保存。通过这种同步功能，Harbor 能帮您将临时性的标签页管理与长期的信息存储无缝结合。
long.en:
A ready-to-use Chrome Tabs management tool, offering a better user experience than OneTab

## Kanban-style Tab Management UI
- 🎯 Manage tab collections through drag-and-drop in a Trello-like kanban board
- 🔄 Restore tab collections to browser windows with one click
- 💾 Local-first: Your tab data is primarily stored on your local device. Import and export anytime
- 🔒 Automatic local file backup ensures your tabs are always accessible and never lost

## Instant Tab Organization in Popup Window
- 🤖 AI-powered smart tab grouping
- 🌐 Automatic tab grouping by domain
- 🗑️ One-click duplicate tab removal for current window
- 💾 Save All Tabs: Quickly save tabs to Harbor while preserving "tab group" structure

## Third-party App Sync: From "Temporary" Tab Collections to "Permanent" Bookmarks
- 🔗 Supports syncing tabs with Notion and Raindrop, allowing you to permanently save important tab collections. Through this sync functionality, Harbor helps seamlessly combine temporary tab management with long-term information storage.
